SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Appointment
Appointment Class - used to hold appointments Methods: selectApptDB(), addApptDB(), updateApptDB(), deleteApptDB(), checkTimeConflict()
AppointmentController
AppointmentController Class - used to modify and view data from a already existing appointment object.
AppointmentList
Appointment List Class - holds a list of appointments
AppointmentView
AppointmentView Class - used to display info for a given appointment object.
createAccountServlet
createAccountServlet - creates patient object using the data the user inputs on the createAccount.html page.
DeleteApptServlet
DeleteApptServlet - used to delete an appointment from database.
Dentist
Dentist Class - used to hold dentists Methods: selectDentistDB(), addDentistDB(), updateDentistDB(), deleteDentistDB(), getAppointments()
DentistController
DentistController Class - used to manipulate and view information of the given dentist object.
dentistCreateAccountServlet
dentistCreateAccountServlet - creates dentist object using the data the user inputs on the dentistCreateAccount.html page.
DentistList
DentistList Class - used to hold a list of dentists.
dentistLogin
dentistLogin Servlet - searches the database for a dentist with the ID entered by the user, if found it then makes sure the entered password matches the password stored in the database.
dentistUpdateAccountServlet
dentistUpdateAccountServlet - updates the dentist's information in the database after the user changes input field and submits.
DentistView
DentistView Class - used to display information of a given Dentist object.
Patient
Patient Class - used to hold patients Methods: selectPatientDB(), addPatientDB(), updatePatientDB(), deletePatientDB(), getProcedures(), getDentists()
PatientController
PatientController class - used to manipulate and view information of a given patient.
patientLogin
patientLogin Servlet - searches the database for a patient with the ID entered by the user, if found it then makes sure the entered password matches the password stored in the database.
patientUpdateAccountServlet
patientUpdateAccountServlet - updates patient information in database once the user changes input field and submits.
PatientView
PatientView Class - used to display the information of a given patient.
Procedure
Procedure Class - used to store procedures Methods: selectProcedureDB(), addProcedureDB(), updateProcedureDB(), deleteProcedureDB()
ProcedureController
ProcedureController Class - used to modify and view information of a given procedure.
ProcedureList
ProcedureList Class - used to hold a list of procedures.
ProcedureView
ProcedureView Class - used to display information of a given procedure.
ScheduleApptServlet
ScheduleApptServlet - this servlet creates an appointment object using the data the user inputs on the patientScheduleAppointment.jsp.
